TopicTitle: [Stock 0.16] VTOL : Chinook and Wasp II UPDATED!

Articles.Content:
Hey guys I\'m brand new here. I first landed on this site through the exchange. I was trying to download a member\'s Hornet but it ended up being 0.15, so I decided make one for 0.16 based on his design. Hope you guys enjoy my aircrafts.

Chinook airbus

Wasp II

Edited September 6, 2012 by Orthodoks
Amazing job cant wait to play around with them! ;D

Update: Wasp II now available, made changes to Wasp so its a lot more stable, responsive and controllable. Maneuverability and handling stays the same with fuel consumption. Looking to make these same changes to the Chinook, which is fairly hard to fly at this point but a fun challenging flight.
